Source...............: This recode was made off of a test DVD struck from a DVCAM copy which was duped from the Betacam SP master tape back in 2000, well before Eastern Heroes had designed any official menu's/artwork etc.   The attached cover image is a VHS cover printed by Hong Kong Superstars themselves, again before Eastern Heroes came on-board to release it. Except for the Anthony Wong and Simon Yam sections which were shot on DV, the project was shot on a VHSC camera.
 Due to this and the DVD not being taken directly from the Beta master the picture quality leaves much to be desired. However the rarity of the footage makes up for any visual deficiencies.

From its early days as a Fan Club, through to the publication of its own magazine and our fantastic live events, the "HKS" has always given the fans of Hong Kong Cinema what they want. The HKS Video gives you the chance to get up close and personal with some of the industry's hottest stars, including interviews with superstars Donnie Yen, Anthony Wong, Simon Yam and Francis Ng, femme fatale girls Moon Lee and Elaine Liu, Shaw Brothers legend Lo Mang, newcomers Daniel Wu and Stephen Fung, Brit Boys Darren Shahlavi, Jude Poyer and Bey Logan and directors Johnnie To and Teddy Chen.
 Also includes rare behind the scenes footage of Tai Chi 2, The Mission and Purple Storm.
